text: Glen Clay Higgins (born August 24, 1961) is an American Republican politician and reserve law enforcement officer. He has been the U.S. representative for Louisiana's 3rd congressional district since 2017. He is a member of the House Freedom Caucus, and his political views have been seen as far-right. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman Clay Higgins official U.S. House website *Campaign website * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:American police officers Category:United States representatives from Louisiana Category:Politicians from New Orleans Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Clay Higgins
